trans-unit.source: the ip or fqdn to the database server hosting the vufind session database. Defaults to 'localhost'. Do not leave empty.
the port of the database server. Defaults to 3306. Do not leave empty.
the name of the database that holds the vufind session table. Defaults to 'vufind'. Do not leave empty.
the database user to connect with. defaults to 'vufind'. Do not leave empty.
the password of the database user. no default. If left empty no password is used.
the domain name the cookie is saved as. no default. If left empty no cookie domain is set.
the storage folder where the vufind users and groups are stored.
the name of the vufind session cookie. defaults to 'PHPSESSID'. There might be issues with programs sharing the same cookie name.
the lifetime of the vufind session cookie. defaults to 3600 seconds - one hour. This should equal the session lifetime configured for vufind, see `[Session]lifetime` in your config.ini.
